EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to your Home Solar Loan with BlueWave
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Dear {!Opportunity.Name},
Welcome to BlueWave!
We are pleased to service your Home Solar Loan and look forward to working with you.
Unless otherwise requested, you will receive all monthly statements and communication to this email address: {!Opportunity.Email__c}
You will receive your first monthly invoice shortly.
To make a payment, we currently offer the following options:
• Recurring payments from checking or savings account: Please complete and return the attached form to set this up immediately. Please return this form by email or regular mail to the appropriate address listed below.
• Mailed payments to: BlueWave Renewables, PO Box 772, Albany, NY 12201-0772
If you require assistance or have any questions, please contact us by phone here: 1-866-874-4761, by email here: customerservice@bluewaverenewablessupport.com, or by regular mail here: BlueWave Renewables, PO Box 772, Albany, NY 12201-0772
Thanks for joining us to make ‘Solar for the 100%' not just a mission, but a reality. www.bluewaverenewables.com
